name: Rigid Force Alpha - Original Soundtrack
detailed_description:
The full original soundtrack of Rigid Force Alpha with 29 tracks from Dreamtime and Michael Chait. It contains all your favourite synthwave songs from the game as well as bonus tracks and exclusive previously unpublished material. Tracks will be downloaded to your Rigid Force Alpha folder.

Tracklist:
01 – Welcome aboard³
02 – Rigid Force Alpha Theme¹
03 – Main Menu²
04 – Mission Briefing¹
05 – Starting Mission³
06 – Mining Outpost Alpha¹
07 – Vermis Research Institute¹
08 – The Caverns of Vurgos¹
09 – Creeo Omega Base¹
10 – Aestus Facilities¹
11 – The Hive¹
12 – Caution³
13 – Suspense¹
14 – Haste²
15 – Versus machines¹
16 – No time to rest¹
17 – Don’t lose your head²
18 – There can be only one²
19 – Escape³
20 – Outro²
21 – Credits¹
22 – Peace at last³
23 – Continue (Bonus Track)¹
24 – Level completed (Bonus Track)¹
25 – Boss defeated (Bonus Track)¹
26 – Player defeated (Bonus Track)¹
27 – Game Over (Bonus Track)¹
28 – Aboard the battleship (Bonus Track)²
29 – Congratulations³

¹ Composed, mixed and mastered by Dreamtime
² Composed by Michael Chait, mixed and mastered by Danny Chait
³ Voiced by Natalie Hitzel, mixed and mastered by Marcel Rebenstorf
